meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one billionth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the medicine in nanograms to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used nanograms to weigh the tiny particles.
meanings.sent3: The baker needed just a few nanograms of salt for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His patience was as light as a nanogram when waiting for the results.
meanings.sent5: The nanograms of pollen in the air were almost invisible but caused allergies.
